prompt: A dark and vibrant fantasy scene set in a mysterious swamp shrouded in mist. Centered is an intricate and glowing network of enchanted vines, casting a soft blue and green light. The vines seem to pulse with magical energy, illuminating nearby ancient trees and mystical flora. Eerie lighting creates an enchanting yet foreboding atmosphere, with mystical symbols subtly intertwined with the vines. Exotic, surreal flowers bloom with an otherworldly glow, and faint, ghostly shapes move through the shadows. The entire scene has a magical, ethereal quality, evoking a sense of hidden power and ancient secrets.
